Join us on Wednesday for a Historical Behind the Scenes Tour of Parris Island! The tours leave from the Douglas Visitors' Center, first tour at 11:00 and the second tour at 12:00. 
 We can accommodate the majority of the standby line usually on either the 11:00 or 12:00 tours so please feel free to stop by and enjoy this opportunity!!
